alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:03PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Platte County through 345 PM MDT... At 302 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeview North, or near Wheatland, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Chugcreek, Lakeview North, Y-O Ranch and Westview Circle. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 76 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County
